original_text: Then the Lord Jesus turned round and he looked at Peter. Peter remembered what Jesus had said to him: ‘You will say tonight that you do not know me. You will say it three times before the cockerel sings in the morning.’
korean_text: 주께서 돌이켜 베드로를 보시니 베드로가 주의 말씀 곧 오늘 닭 울기 전에 네가 세 번 나를 부인하리라 하심이 생각나서

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord Jesus turned round
Peter remembered what Jesus had said to him
sentences.korean_translation: 베드로는 예수님께서 자기에게 하신 말씀을 기억했습니다

sentences.original_text: You will say tonight that you do not know me
sentences.korean_translation: 오늘 밤 너는 나를 모른다고 말할 것이다

sentences.original_text: You will say it three times
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그것을 세 번 말할 것이다

sentences.original_text: before the cockerel sings in the morning
